verse.gurmukhi: qoso n nwQ AnwQ n mosir qoso n dwnI n moso iBKwrI ]
verse.unicode: ਤੋਸੋ ਨ ਨਾਥ ਅਨਾਥ ਨ ਮੋਸਰਿ ਤੋਸੋ ਨ ਦਾਨੀ ਨ ਮੋਸੋ ਭਿਖਾਰੀ ॥

en.bdb: O  True Guru! there is no Master like You. But there is no one as dependent as I am. There is no one as great a donor as You and there is no beggar as needy as me.

transliteration.english: toso na naath anaath na mosar toso na dhaanee na moso bhikhaaree ||
transliteration.hindi: तोसो न नाथ अनाथ न मोसरि तोसो न दानी न मोसो भिखारी ॥
transliteration.en: toso na naath anaath na mosar toso na dhaanee na moso bhikhaaree ||
transliteration.hi: तोसो न नाथ अनाथ न मोसरि तोसो न दानी न मोसो भिखारी ॥
transliteration.ipa: t̪ɔsɔ nə nɑt̪ʰ ənɑt̪ʰ nə mɔsər t̪ɔsɔ nə d̪ɑni nə mɔsɔ ɓɪkʰɑri.
transliteration.ur: توسو ن ناتھ اناتھ ن موسر توسو ن دانیِ ن موسو بھکھاریِ ۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: moso n dIn dXwl n qosir moso AgXwin n qoso ibcwrI ]
verse.unicode: ਮੋਸੋ ਨ ਦੀਨ ਦਯਾਲ ਨ ਤੋਸਰਿ ਮੋਸੋ ਅਗਯਾਨਿ ਨ ਤੋਸੋ ਬਿਚਾਰੀ ॥

en.bdb: No one is as miserable as I am but none is as clement as You. No one is as ignorant as I am but there is no one as knowledgeable as You.

transliteration.english: moso na dheen dhayaal na tosar moso agayaan na toso bichaaree ||
transliteration.hindi: मोसो न दीन दयाल न तोसरि मोसो अगयानि न तोसो बिचारी ॥
transliteration.en: moso na dheen dhayaal na tosar moso agayaan na toso bichaaree ||
transliteration.hi: मोसो न दीन दयाल न तोसरि मोसो अगयानि न तोसो बिचारी ॥
transliteration.ipa: mɔsɔ nə d̪in d̪əjɑl nə t̪ɔsər mɔsɔ əGəjɑn nə t̪ɔsɔ bɪt͡ʃɑri.
transliteration.ur: موسو ن دیٍن دےال ن توسر موسو اگےان ن توسو بچاریِ ۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: moso n piqq n pwvn qosir moso ibkwrI n qoso aupkwrI ]
verse.unicode: ਮੋਸੋ ਨ ਪਤਿਤ ਨ ਪਾਵਨ ਤੋਸਰਿ ਮੋਸੋ ਬਿਕਾਰੀ ਨ ਤੋਸੋ ਉਪਕਾਰੀ ॥

en.bdb: There is no one who has fallen so low in his deeds and actions as I am. But there is no one else who can purify anyone as much as you. There is no one as sinful as I am and none who can do good as much as you can.

transliteration.english: moso na patit na paavan tosar moso bikaaree na toso upakaaree ||
transliteration.hindi: मोसो न पतित न पावन तोसरि मोसो बिकारी न तोसो उपकारी ॥
transliteration.en: moso na patit na paavan tosar moso bikaaree na toso upakaaree ||
transliteration.hi: मोसो न पतित न पावन तोसरि मोसो बिकारी न तोसो उपकारी ॥
transliteration.ipa: mɔsɔ nə pət̪ɪt̪ nə pɑʋən t̪ɔsər mɔsɔ bɪkɑri nə t̪ɔsɔ oʊpəkɑri.
transliteration.ur: موسو ن پتت ن پاون توسر موسو بکاریِ ن توسو اُپکاریِ ۔۔

verse.gurmukhi: myry hY Avgun qU gun swgr jwq rswql Et iqhwrI ]528]
verse.unicode: ਮੇਰੇ ਹੈ ਅਵਗੁਨ ਤੂ ਗੁਨ ਸਾਗਰ ਜਾਤ ਰਸਾਤਲ ਓਟ ਤਿਹਾਰੀ ॥੫੨੮॥

en.bdb: I am full of faults and demerits but You are an ocean of virtues. You are my refuge on my way to hell.  (528)

transliteration.english: mere hai avagun too gun saagar jaat rasaatal oT tihaaree ||528||
transliteration.hindi: मेरे है अवगुन तू गुन सागर जात रसातल ओट तिहारी ॥५२८॥
transliteration.en: mere hai avagun too gun saagar jaat rasaatal oT tihaaree ||528||
transliteration.hi: मेरे है अवगुन तू गुन सागर जात रसातल ओट तिहारी ॥५२८॥
transliteration.ipa: mere hæ əʋəGʊn t̪u Gʊn sɑGər d͡ʒɑt̪ rəsɑt̪əl oəʈ t̪ɪhɑri.5ə2ə8.
transliteration.ur: مےرے هَے اوگن تُو گُن ساگر جات رساتل اوٹ تهاریِ ۔۔۵۲۸۔۔
